360-Degree Camera: A camera that captures a 360-degree view of the person, allowing them to see their reflection from all angles.
Virtual Reality Headset: A VR headset that creates a virtual environment where the person can see their reflection in a virtual space.
Augmented Reality Glasses: AR glasses that overlay a digital representation of the person onto the real world, allowing them to see their reflection in real-time.
Smart Mirror: A mirror that uses AI technology to analyze the person's appearance and provide personalized recommendations for makeup, hairstyles, and fashion.
Mirrorless Camera: A camera that uses a digital display to show the person's reflection, allowing them to take selfies or group photos without the need for a traditional mirror.
